TopicTitle: An old trailer for KSP 0.12 that I found.

Articles.Content:
A trailer for KSP 0.12. This was a free version. It is actually totally legal to download this version without paying for it.

[Hello Dolly, or WALL-E? Which do you recognize?]

Anyway, I didn't make this. But I do find the flag and the implied EVA interesting. (Keep in mind that EVAs weren't implemented until

and flags until
.)

BTW, 0.16 was my first paid version, and holds a special place in my heart.

Edited November 8, 2014 by GregroxMun
So beautiful :')

Oh, the Nostalgia.

I started playing KSP in 0.12.

0.20, reporting in! *sobs*

WOW! That is amazing!

Could i get a different link. It says it is not available in my country (UK).

Thanks.

Could i get a different link. It says it is not available in my country (UK).

Thanks.

Same for me
Why the hell is this not available in my country....

Why the hell is this not available in my country....

Because you are on Eeloo and Eeloo is not a country. XD
Squad needs to do something like this for the beta. It was very nice, subtle, and described the game in 1 minute and 5 seconds.
Wow, I actually remember this from long ago! Very different from Build. Fly. Dream. but also very good. Them kerbals just wanna space so hard!
That is awesome. I don't know how I missed it!
Does any one know a way to cheat the country system on youtube?

Does any one know a way to cheat the country system on youtube?

You can temporarily change your ip to that of one from another country.
Anyone else getting a Space Cowboys vibe from that?

You can temporarily change your ip to that of one from another country.

How do I do that?

How do I do that?

Use a VPN. I recommend VPNBook, which has several countries' IP addresses to choose from. It also supports both OpenVPN and PPTP VPN standards.

Anyone else getting a Space Cowboys vibe from that?

Very much so, yes.

I remember when this first came out. Still makes me a bit misty-eyed.

Awesome. Why are all the most epic trailers the oldest ones? Now Squad just seems to do cutsy things where a building explodes or something...

IMHO, if you're not playing KSP yet, it's because you don't know how EPIC and AWESOME it is- not because you don't know about the latest feature. Squad needs to get back to the basics with their trailers...

Regards,

Northstar

Use a VPN. I recommend VPNBook, which has several countries' IP addresses to choose from. It also supports both OpenVPN and PPTP VPN standards.

Thanks but it's not worth it just for one video. Does any one have a different link?

Thanks but it's not worth it just for one video. Does any one have a different link?

They've also got a web proxy which allows you to view blocked videos directly from a window in your browser. Pretty good for single videos, but not as good for long-term use like me.

Holy... The NOSTALGIA! I remember when some guy made that giant rock, moon, thing mod, with the challenge to put it in orbit... Holy nostalgia. Oh, and congrats - you got me to log in for the first time in FOREVER. I am the self-declared Prime Lurker.
